body:
$AAPL $NVDA $SPY $AMD 
$TSLA = Unethical company. 
Labor abuse. It's like if you want to keep your job? sleep on the floor.  @Therealelonmusk 

Tesla workers at the automaker's facility in Shanghai will be required to sleep on the factory floor as Tesla restarts production after a three-week shutdown, Bloomberg reported on Monday.
Tesla will provide workers with a sleeping bag and mattress and set aside a portion of the factory floor to be used as sleeping accommodations.

Tesla said in the memo that there will also be spaces for showering, food, and entertainment, but the company is still in the process of setting it up, Bloomberg reported. 

https://www.businessinsider.com/tesla-shanghai-workers-eat-sleep-factory-floor-avoid-shutdowns-report-2022-4

links.title: Tesla workers in Shanghai will reportedly eat and sleep on the factory floor as it enters 'closed-loop system' to avoid further shutdowns
links.description: Tesla's factory in Shanghai is requiring workers to sleep on the factory floor, according to a memo. Workers will operate in a "closed-loop system" from Monday until May 1. It's not uncommon for Chinese manufacturing companies to have on-site dormitories for workers.

Their Revenue for the past year has grown Quarterly an avg of 19%. DAUs growth avg of 4% Quarterly.

links.title: Video offers a closer look at how Apple uses its 'Daisy' robot to recycle iPhones
links.description: Back in 2018, Apple introduced "Daisy" - a new robot capable of disassembling iPhones to recycle device parts. Now, thanks to YouTuber Sara Dietschy, we can finally get a closer look at every step Daisy takes to carefully disassemble an iPhone. Dietschy was invited to visit one of Apple's facilities in Texas where the company recycles its devices.

links.title: Ford unveils Lincoln Star electric SUV concept as it readies to add four new EVs by 2026
links.description: DETROIT - Ford Motor plans to introduce four new electric vehicles into its Lincoln lineup by 2026, as the once-dominant American luxury brand reinvents itself to focus on EVs. The new vehicles were announced Wednesday night alongside the unveiling of a new concept EV called the Lincoln Star.

Global Smartphone Q1 Shipments and Vendor Ranking List Released, Three of the Top five are Chinese Brands! 
 
According to analyst firm Canalys, both the unfavorable economic situation and the typical seasonal sluggish demand led to a decline in total global smartphone shipments. $SSNLF took the first place with a 24% share in the first quarter of 2022, which is higher than 19% in the fourth quarter of 2021. $AAPL fell to second place with an 18% market share in the first quarter, which is lower than 22% in the fourth quarter of 2021. Xiaomi ranked the third with a 13% share, OPPO ranked the fourth with a 10% share, and vivo ranked the fifth with an 8% share. Other smartphone manufacturers following the top five took up a 27% of the market share. 
 
https://www.westmoney.com/share/guess?id=966435685819092992&lang=en&color=2&wm=stocktwits10
